alert.note: Alert for Dallam; Hartley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 5:57AM CDT until June 23 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Dallam County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northeastern Hartley County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 700 AM CDT. * At 557 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 16 miles southwest of Dalhart, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Dalhart, Hartley and Conlen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
